con:testCase.name: promo-codes:by-loyalty-email|Search both loyalty & email only with promoID filter

con:configuration.scriptText:
def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def promoCodes = parse.promoCodes log.info promoCodes assert promoCodes!=null
def email = parse.promoCodes.emailAddress log.info email assert email!=null
def loyaltyId = parse.promoCodes.loyaltyId log.info loyaltyId assert loyaltyId!=null
